import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../App.css"; class Home extends Component { render() { const itemList = this.state.tagVisible === "all" ? this.state.items.map((item) => { return (

{item.name} (${prices[item.name]})



); }) : this.state.items .filter((item) => item.tag === this.state.tagVisible) .map((item) => { return (

{item.name} (${prices[item.name]})



); }); return (
{itemList}
); } } export default Home;
